title: 86/167/EEC: Commission Decision of 9 April 1986 approving a modification to the programme for the improvement of livestock marketing and the processing of livestock products in Scotland pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 355/77 (Only the English text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 9 April 1986
approving a modification to the programme for the improvement of livestock marketing and the processing of livestock products in Scotland pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 355/77
(Only the English text is authentic)
(86/167/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The modification for the improvement of livestock marketing and the processing of livestock products in Scotland which was forwarded by the Government of the United Kingdom on 30 April 1985 pursuant to Regulation (EEC) No 355/77 and for which additional information was provided on 4 September 1985 is hereby approved subject to the reservations set out in the recitals above.
This Decision is addressed to the United Kingdom.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 9 April 1986.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
